description: This is a PI (Proportional-Integral) controller block that implements a continuous-time PI control algorithm. The controller can be reset to a specified value using a reset input signal.

parameters.name: ureset0
parameters.description: Default reset output value when ureset is not connected

parameters.name: permanent
parameters.description: Boolean flag to determine if permanent calculation is enabled

input_connectors.name: u
input_connectors.description: Main input signal for the PI controller

input_connectors.name: reset
input_connectors.description: Logical input signal to trigger controller reset

output_connectors.name: y
output_connectors.description: Output signal of the PI controller
